fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Organic agriculture is main focus of out organisation. This is all of our efforts put into organic agriculture.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: UEPP is a Croatian national NGO that organizes organic certified producers into an association. UEPP promotes and organizes organic fairs and organic certificate. Also it is active in policy making in Croatia for organic agriculture.
relevant_communication:
Educating consumers about organic agriculture 
Promotion of organic certificate
